Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Proposed explanations The extended durations in cases 2003 and 2005 are primarily due to the high complexity of the claims High complexity claims often require multiple documentation requests as seen in their event logs with several Request Additional Documents steps Each document request adds time to evaluate the claim again or to gather more information thereby extending the process Additionally the multiple steps involved in handling complex claims eg multiple evaluations approvals and documentation requests contribute to longer lead times Region and Resource factors may also play a role However based on the given data the dominant factor is the complexity level

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Suggestions to mitigate 1 Automate documentation requests where possible 2 Implement a prioritization system for high complexity claims 3 Train resources on efficient handling of complex cases 4 Monitor the number of document requests per claim 5 Consider region based resource allocation 6 Review the workflow
